comment.author: 31956482@N05
comment._content: It looks like Main Street Station near the right side of the picture (about 2 o'clock), where the lower train bridge show the tracks going right by it.  Further to the right, you can see MCV West Hospital (a bit past 1 o'clock).

comment.author: 37364511@N06
comment._content: I see Mayo's and the old Seaboard RR bridge..But does anyone have an idea what that small one is?..kinda looks like a pier or pontoon .

comment.author: 15705594@N00
comment._content: Given the date, location, and title of "work bridge", I'm pretty sure it's a construction site for the Richmond-Petersburg Turnpike (I-95) bridge.
